timeline.bodyText: "manages topics for the Zookeeper cluster"? I am not sure what that means? Topics don't apply to the ZK cluster?
timeline.author: tomncooper
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@ The Topic Operator provides a way of managing topics in a Kafka cluster through
 
 .Example architecture for the Topic Operator
 
-image:topic-operator.png[Topic Operator]
+image:topic-operator.png[The Topic Operator manages topics for Kafka and ZooKeeper clusters via KafkaTopic resources]

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            image:kafka-bridge.png[Internal and external HTTP producers and consumers exchange data with the Kafka Bridge]
          
          
            
            image:kafka-bridge.png[Internal and external HTTP producers and consumers exchange data with the Kafka brokers through the Kafka Bridge]
timeline.author: scholzj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,4 +17,4 @@ External clients can access the Kafka Bridge through an OpenShift Route, a loadb
 
 .HTTP internal and external client integration
 
-image:kafka-bridge.png[Kafka Bridge]
+image:kafka-bridge.png[Internal and external HTTP producers and consumers exchange data with the Kafka Bridge]

timeline.bodyText:
I agree with @tomncooper. The Topic Operator connects to Zookeeper, but only to manage topics in Kafka. So IMHO it should be:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            image:topic-operator.png[The Topic Operator manages topics for Kafka and ZooKeeper clusters via KafkaTopic resources]
          
          
            
            image:topic-operator.png[The Topic Operator manages topics for Kafka cluster via KafkaTopic resources]
timeline.author: scholzj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@ The Topic Operator provides a way of managing topics in a Kafka cluster through
 
 .Example architecture for the Topic Operator
 
-image:topic-operator.png[Topic Operator]
+image:topic-operator.png[The Topic Operator manages topics for Kafka and ZooKeeper clusters via KafkaTopic resources]

replies.bodyText:
That might make the alt-text a bit lengthy. Based on guidelines, I've added a signpost:
"See the component descriptions after this image."
